rooms.description: A spacious foyer with wheelchair accessible design and automatic doors, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light, integrated with Vastu principles by aligning the entrance with positive energy flow.

Open-plan living area combining living room and dining space. Incorporates eco-friendly materials such as reclaimed wood and sustainable insulation. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall enhance natural lighting, ensuring ease of wheelchair navigation.
Integrated open kitchen with eco-friendly appliances, energy-efficient design, proper ventilation, and easy access for wheelchair users. Counters are lower to meet accessibility standards.

Primary bedroom suite designed for family of four, featuring a master bed area and additional space that can be partitioned as needed. Includes floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, with Vastu aligned placement in the northeast corner.
Dedicated space for servant's quarters integrated at one side of the plot, ensuring privacy and ease of movement with wheelchair accessible design. Equipped with essential amenities.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible front door with automatic operation and floor-to-ceiling glass panels to allow ample natural light while maintaining security.
Secondary entrance/exit for easy access from the garden or parking, designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind.
Floor-to-ceiling windows strategically placed in living area and bedroom to maximize natural light while maintaining energy efficiency.
